message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident you'll find it a good deal. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our negotiation, $900,000 is still below my minimum threshold. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing $950,000. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us both to walk away satisfied. Let's make this deal happen.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to me.
